original_text: The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of his being, sustaining all things by his powerful word. After he had provided purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty in heaven.
korean_text: 이는 하나님의 영광의 광채시요 그 본체의 형상이시라 그의 능력의 말씀으로 만물을 붙드시며 죄를 정결하게 하는 일을 하시고 높은 곳에 계신 지극히 크신 이의 우편에 앉으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The Son is the radiance of God's glory
and the exact representation of his being
sustaining all things by his powerful word
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 강력한 말씀으로 모든 것을 붙드시며

sentences.original_text: After he had provided purification for sins
he sat down at the right hand
